Plot: Someone from Carlos' past shows up to remind him that he can find true love...he just has to remember where he puts it.
Title: Take It Easy, Charlie
Writer: Rammuel R. Lavarro, Carlos Ledesma, Carlos Ledesma (story), Malena Pichot, Malena Pichot (story)
Actors: Naomi Bell, Carlos Ledesma, Malena Pichot
